title: New: Battle Ground Grammar – Knew Back Then
content:
Battle Ground Grammar is Seattle musician, producer and songwriter Andrew Gospe. Back in October, he quietly dropped his debut EP BGG, a collection of tracks that moved with ease between groovy UK/garage vibes and soulful down-tempo serenades. The real surprise, though, came with the vagabond boogie anthem ‘Knew Back Then’, a wicked R&B sampledelia of pitched down vocals and tribal percussion that nurtures an unexpected dance floor sensitivity inside its crazy rhythm.

BGG is available for free download over here.
